articles.title: Time loops may not be forbidden by physics after all
articles.description: Physicists find that causal loops, where two events separated in time influence each other in paradoxical ways, are allowed in many theoretical universes, some of which share features with our own
articles.content:
By Karmela Padavic-Callaghan
In certain universes, achieving a time loop is possible without breaking physics
andrey_l/Shutterstock
A causal loop is a classic time travel conundrum. If you send in… [+369 chars]

articles.title: Snapping shrimps have helmets to ward off shock waves from their claws
articles.description: Snapping shrimps seem immune to the shock waves their claws produce to kill or stun other animals – and it is all thanks to their head gear

articles.title: Fields medal 2022: Work on prime numbers and spheres wins maths prize
articles.description: Mathematicians who have studied the most efficient way to pack spheres in eight-dimensional space and the spacing of prime numbers are among this year's recipients of the highest award in mathematics, the Fields medal
articles.content:
